and FairScheduler page not performed ;
js console log:
Uncaught ReferenceError: appsTableData is not defined (see screenshot)

Too hard to show this situation , I submit job of cycling util this issue arise;

Simple way to fix it , I change all YarnApplicationState to RMAppState in FairSchedulerAppsBlock ;
anybody have good idea?

fields.summary: FairScheduler page not performed because different enum of YarnApplicationState and RMAppState
